Title: Paar
Writer: Partha Banerjee, Samaresh Basu (story "Paarhi"), Goutam Ghose (screenplay), Partho Mukerjee (screenplay)
Actors: Naseeruddin Shah, Shabana Azmi, Utpal Dutt, Anil Chatterjee
Plot: This is Goutam Ghose's speculative commentary on poverty and exploitation in rural Bihar, based on Bengali story Paathi.
